name: Delibird
flavorText:
It carries food
all day long.
There are tales about lost people
who were saved by
the food it had.

previous.name: Octillery
previous.flavorText:
It traps enemies
with its suction-
cupped tentacles then smashes them
with its rock-hard
head.

next.name: Mantine
next.flavorText:
As it majestically
swims, it doesn't
care if REMORAID attach to it for
scavenging its
leftovers.
